project.title: Word Art
project.about: Inspired by a highschool art project which took weeks to complete, but only takes 20 minutes on Photoshop. This is a dynamic implementation of that project.

project.title: Geometry Spy
project.about: An survey in the format of a point-and-shoot game to measure people's perceptions of geometric properties. At the moment, KineticJs library is behaving weirdly on Chrome. Please view the demo in Firefox.

project.title: Intelligent Energy Choices
project.about: A simulation game where the player becomes the leader of a country and is responsible for the energy usage of his/her country. The purpose of this game is to show how economy, energy, and environmental changes are related.

project.title: Alignment Correction of the Cathode Strip Chamber in ATLAS Detector
project.about: Summer 2010, I was part of Brookhaven National Labs' SULI program. My project was do to data analysis for the CSC component of the ATLAS detector, one of the four detectors located at the LHC.

project.title: The Sentence of Reed Wright
project.about: Animated short about a man named Reed Wright sentenced to a life as the read-write pointer in a Turing Machine. The narration features lines from Oscar Wilde's "Ballad of Reading Gaol". Originally prototyped in 2009 in for a multimedia course. But I wanted to revise and refine this project into something I myself can be proud of making.
